subject: Procurement of fee collecting agencies through open competitive bidding system
text: 9Tdf14 77efl4 (UTHT faorrut {Hq Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (d36 @artt &r TATi TATGT+) #AR / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 Mt 7IV National Highways Authority of India QAA. IExtn = 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 6if-5 &a 6, #der-10, ETEGT; 7f fcrft _ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/CMD-CO/ Tolling Options /08-09 19th February 2010 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCOMMERCIALOPERATIONS_ 116 Sub:: Procurement of fee collecting agencies through Open Competitive Bidding System A new policy for procurement of user fee collection agencies is under consideration_ Therefore, no fresh   requisition for  engagement of collection agency through DGR system is to be placed to DGR Office: Wherever the fresh names have  already been received, no new selection of collection agency is to be carried out till further orders_ Wherever the orders for termination of the existing agency have already been issued, the directions will be issued on case-to-case basis. Wherever the   stipulated   period of the existing agency is expiring/ already expired, the proposal for their extension or termination, whatever the case may based on performance of the collection agency may be submitted to HQ well in advance. This is issued with the approval of the Competent Authority for strict compliance. V ialelo (J K Pandey) Chief General Manager (CO) To All RO/ PIU's/ CMU's to: 1_ All Members/ CGMs/ CVO 2. All GMs 3. PS to Chairman 4. Director (Self Employment) Director General Resettlement, Government of India, Ministry of Defence, New Delhi 5. Librarian NHAL be, Copy
